name: Central
headline: Eliminating business bullshit: payroll, benefits, compliance, etc
description:
Central is an automated back-office designed for founders that handles all the bullshit required to run a compliant business like payroll, benefits, government filings, etc.

Unlike traditional HR platforms that require expertise and make you do the work, Central acts as a proactive teammate that just takes of everything.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:fintech; industry:b2b; industry:hr-tech; industry:payroll; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Josh Wymer, Founder
founders.description: Josh is the CEO at Central. He was the 12th employee at Mixpanel, ran product engineering, and helped scale it to $1b+ valuation. He's also worked as a software engineer at Meta and played baseball at Virginia Tech.

founders.name: Pranav Kashyap, Founder
founders.description: Pranav is the COO at Central, helping other companies automate back-office work. He previously built payment and tax products for millions of users at Stripe, rebuilt Mixpanel's self-serve and messaging products and spent a number of years working with technology companies at McKinsey and Sequoia Capital. He holds a bachelor's degree in Computer Science from IIT Bombay and an MBA from Wharton.

founders.name: Nilay Modi, Founder
founders.description: Second-time YC founder & CPO at Central. I lead all things product, design and go-to-market. Previously, founded and ran Clayboard (W20) for 3 years.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Central**

Founded in 2023, Central is a San Francisco-based startup that's taken on the bold mission of eliminating business bullshit. By automating back-office operations for founders—covering payroll, benefits, compliance, and more—Central aims to free entrepreneurs from the mundane tasks that typically bog down their focus. They’re the proactive teammate startups need, instead of a traditional HR platform that just dumps the burden on users.

**What They Do:**

Central simplifies business operations through smart automation. Here’s a breakdown of their offerings:
- **Payroll Management**: Easily onboard, manage U.S. employees across all 50 states, and hire independent contractors in over 200 countries. They handle everything from tax withholdings to paystubs.
- **Benefits Administration**: Central provides insurance plans customized for startups, including medical, dental, vision, and 401(k) options.
- **Compliance Automation**: The platform automates state registrations, government filings, and even watches for government mail—so you don’t have to worry about compliance headaches.
- **Business Insurance**: Custom plans offer protections against unexpected risks for startups.
- **Slack Integration**: Users can manage HR tasks seamlessly through Slack, making updates and retrieving information quick and efficient.

With a straightforward pricing model of $50 per member per month, Central touts a rapid onboarding process that takes just 15 minutes. It's designed for founders, not HR or finance experts, allowing them to focus on building their companies without getting distracted by operations.

**Team & Backing:**
Central operates with a lean team of 13 employees and is part of Y Combinator’s Batch S24, under the guidance of partner Gustaf Alstromer. This backing emphasizes Central’s potential and aligns it with a network of innovative startups.

**Testimonials & Impact:**
Feedback from users reflects a strong appreciation for Central’s impact on productivity and peace of mind. Founders report feeling empowered to focus on their core missions, rather than getting lost in the minutiae of operating a compliant business. Notable mentions highlight how Central has enabled startups to grow without the additional weight of administrative tasks.

**Conclusion:**
In an era where inefficiency can deter progress, Central steps in as a modern solution for startups—streamlining crucial but tedious operations. If you’re a founder looking for a way to juggle every aspect of launching and maintaining your business without getting crushed by details, Central is an indispensable tool. Check them out at [Central HQ](https://centralhq.com).
